title: cryptomahmud
author: cryptomahmud
content: BUILD YOUR HEIST SQUADAssemble your 5 player heist team and choose one of the heist maps and start heisting right away! Try to smuggle all jewelry, drugs, money, valuables within 15 minutes. Get a HEBAG payment for all the valuables you collect!Don't forget! You will not rob an empty place, there will be other teams defending it.CREATE YOUR ROBBERY STYLE!Spice up your heists by customizing your weapons, outfits and mask! Attract other players' attention by using luxury items. Own rare items and express your fashion taste by creating your own designs!Open skin cases to be sold in-game and try to catch rare items!NAME YOUR HEIST GANG!If you think you are a unique and powerful heist gang, choose a gang name and logo for yourself! May all other players be unhappy to see you.Don't forget to collect taxes from gang members!Website: https://heistbag.ioBuy on PancakeSwap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x7d050a67cd418556812d74a5e377de5f4a5fe522
